message: The iQIES Training Environment is for training and testing purposes only. We encourage you to submit feedback while you preview the iQIES Training Environment. To submit feedback please send an email to iqies@cms.hhs.gov using the subject line: iQIES Training Environment Feedback. Please make sure to provide as much context as you can and include the provider type you are working with. If you have any questions, please contact our QIES/iQIES Service Center at: iqies@cms.hhs.gov or call 1-888-477-7876 (Select Option 1)
